backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing an e-commerce backend with authorization and blob storage mixins, managing products, orders, carts, and user profiles with role-based access control for admin and user operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single feature change to update the ProductCatalog hero section tagline from 'DISCOVER PREMIUM TECHNOLOGY' to 'MAKE YOUR OWN CHOICE WITH PREMIUM OUTFIT'.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of frontend files describing the UI implementation with vibrant blue-cyan theming, product catalog, checkout flow, admin pages, and various React components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, and sidebar color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with 'OM FANCY' title and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for product catalog, checkout, order pages, account management, and admin sections with theme provider and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that checks authentication and admin status, displaying appropriate access denied messages with loading states for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart panel component displaying cart items with images, prices, total calculation, clear cart functionality, and checkout navigation with gradient styling and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/CartButton.tsx: Shopping cart button with item count badge that opens a sheet panel containing the Cart component, featuring gradient badge styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header, navigation links (Products, My Account, Admin sections), and renders child content. Conditionally displays navigation items based on authentication status and admin role.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button component that handles Internet Identity authentication, displays loading state during login, and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name. Prevents dismissal until profile is created.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for products, cart, orders, and user profile operations. Includes queries for fetching data and mutations for adding/updating/deleting with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, plus base typography styles using Space Grotesk and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrders.tsx: Admin page that displays all customer orders in an accordion layout, showing order details including customer info, payment method, products, and total price.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProducts.tsx: Admin page for managing products with CRUD operations (add, edit, delete) including image upload, form validation, and product listing display.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page with customer information form, payment method selection (cash on delivery, credit card, crypto), cart summary, and order submission functionality.
frontend/src/pages/MyAccount.tsx: Customer account page displaying user's order history sorted by most recent, with navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page shown after successful checkout, displaying order details including items, payment method, and total with a success message.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetails.tsx: Displays detailed order information including customer details, payment method, and order items with images and pricing. Uses React Router for navigation and displays loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Main product catalog page with hero banner showing 'OM FANCY & GIFT COLLECTION' branding and tagline 'Make your own choice with premium outfit'. Displays product grid with add-to-cart functionality requiring authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended animations, Space Grotesk font, and custom shadows/border-radius utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the e-commerce store for 'OM FANCY & GIFT COLLECTION' with completed feature to update hero tagline to 'MAKE YOUR OWN CHOICE WITH PREMIUM OUTFIT'.
